description: Provide, deliver and install two (2) prefabricated private phone booths to the Canadian Food Inspection Agency in Newfoundland. The delivery is requested by May 31, 2023. There is no security associated with the requirement. The requirement is subject to a preference for Canadian goods.
full_summary:
## EB129-231313 - Government Tender Announcement
**Tender Reference:** WS3872083451-Doc3922547564
**Announcement Date:** March 20, 2023

This is a call for proposals from qualified Offerors to provide prefabricated private phone booths to the Canadian Food Inspection Agency in Newfoundland. The following information is a synopsis of the solicitation:

**Call Type:** Open Bidding

**Call Description:** Canada is seeking offers to provide two (2) prefabricated private phone booths with installation. The delivery deadline is May 31, 2023. The requirement is subject to a preference for Canadian goods.

**Solicitation Package Availability:** The solicitation package, including further specifications and information, is available on the Ariba website at: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15750111?extsite=MTU3NTAxMTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Procurement Details:**

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** None
* **Regions of Delivery:** Newfoundland and Labrador
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Maryse Cyr (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Phone: [ none ]
	+ Email: [maryse.cyr@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:maryse.cyr@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

If you have any questions or concerns about the tender, you can reach Maryse Cyr. Note that the Contracting Entity reserves the right to accept or reject any offer. The government will notify all shortlisted Offerors and the successful contractor once the evaluation process is complete.

**Deadline for Offers:** April 20, 2023 at 2:00 PM ADT

For any inquiries, kindly contact Maryse Cyr. Thank you for your cooperation in this solicitation process.

Sincerely,
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

This rewritten entry condenses the information while maintaining professionalism and clarity. It is easier to quickly identify the key details such as the deadline for offers, the procurement details, and the contracting entity. It's also easier for international contractors to
